ygData.subject: Re: Looking for Glimpse and other Vision spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Glimpse is in Neriak.. I have it.  It is in the library type building there.  I can t think of the name, but it isn t a true guild hall though there are
ygData.messageBody:
Glimpse is in Neriak.. I have it. It is in the library type building
there. I can't think of the name, but it isn't a true guild hall though
there are vendors there selling spells for all types of magic user.



At 01:33 PM 5/19/99 -0400, you wrote:
